dialogue.headline:
The script of the era has been shattered, the uniform melody has fallen apart
In this chaotic age, can we find balance once again?
dialogue.paragraph1: In 2026, as IT professionals and students, we stand at the forefront of a transformative era. The rise of AI challenges traditional development models, and the technical barriers that once defined our value are gradually crumbling. When the power to create becomes democratized and individual technical skills can no longer serve as our moat, "collaboration" becomes our most important lesson. We are heading into a grand chaos seeking harmony with AI, peers, and cross-domain partners. But what if "chaos" is not an obstacle, but the starting point of a new balance?
dialogue.paragraph2: In the JamSession of improvisational music, there is no conductor. When the Jam's beat doesn't sync, let's create a new beat together. When the Jam's harmony isn't perfect, this is precisely the sound of our generation—inclusive, bold, and diverse. At SITCON 2026, we invite you to join this Jam. Let us harness the chaos, find rhythm in disorder, and seek resonance in collaboration.
dialogue.paragraph3: Students' Information Technology Conference (SITCON), initiated in 2012, is student-centered and student-organized. We are committed to student IT education and promoting the open-source spirit, hoping to guide more students into the realm of information technology. We also hope that all students interested in IT can gather at the conference to inspire, pass on knowledge, and learn from each other, achieving the practical demonstration of "learning by doing" and "teaching and learning together."

activities.title: Guided Tour
activities.body:
At the bustling SITCON annual conference, are you feeling a bit lost? Still unsure where to go next?

Don't worry. At the tour meeting point you will see guides holding SITCON flags. Follow them as they lead you to community booths, the poster exhibition, and the cafe, helping you learn more about SITCON and how it operates.

Tours are divided into a morning and an afternoon group. The morning tour runs from 11:00 to 11:40 and meets next to the whiteboard area on 3F. The afternoon tour runs from 14:40 to 15:20 and meets near the cafe and poster exhibition on 2F.

Join the tour and uncover the excitement of the conference with new friends!

general.name: General Coordinator
general.description: The core team that coordinates the entire conference, responsible for coordinating operations across all teams and setting conference direction and policies. We are the navigators of the conference, ensuring smooth execution and achievement of goals.

administration.name: Administration
administration.description: Handles all administrative affairs of the conference, including documentation, meeting minutes, and internal communication coordination. We are the lubricant of team operations, ensuring all processes run smoothly.

agenda.name: Agenda
agenda.description: Responsible for all conference agenda planning and speaker invitations, the core content producers of the conference. We review numerous technical submissions and select the most suitable topics to ensure attendees receive the highest quality content.

operations.name: Operations
operations.description: The on-site guardians of the conference day, responsible for traffic flow planning, equipment setup, and emergency response. We are the unsung heroes ensuring smooth event execution, requiring strong adaptability to face various challenges.

design.name: Design
design.description: Responsible for the conference's main visual design and merchandise, using colors and lines to depict SITCON's appearance. We pursue visual perfection, dedicated to materializing abstract concepts and bringing the most perfect visual feast to everyone.

finance.name: Finance
finance.description: Manages the conference's financial affairs, ensuring every sponsorship and budget allocation achieves maximum effectiveness. We need care and patience to handle complex accounting and budget planning, serving as the solid backbone behind the event.

recording.name: Recording
recording.description: Captures every exciting moment of the conference through the lens, responsible for event photography and video documentation. We are the guardians of conference memories, preserving every moment of emotion permanently.

production.name: Production
production.description: Responsible for the conference's audio-visual equipment and livestream systems, ensuring sessions are smoothly presented to all participants. We combine technology with art, making every presentation perfectly delivered.

development.name: Development
development.description: Dedicated to building the digital foundation of the conference with code, maintaining stable operation of the website and app. We are a group of technology-loving developers, transforming imaginative designs into actual interactive experiences. Welcome to exchange ideas here!

editorial.name: Editorial
editorial.description: Responsible for producing and proofreading all text content for the conference, including website copy, promotional materials, and press releases. We convey SITCON's spirit through words, ensuring every message accurately reaches the target audience.

marketing.name: Marketing
marketing.description: Responsible for external promotion and community management of the conference, making SITCON known to more people through various channels. We are the spokespersons of the conference, promoting the event to the world with creativity and passion.

referral.heroSubtitle: Invite Friends to Join and Get Rewards

intro.paragraph1: SITCON 2026 invites you to share the open-source spirit with more people.
intro.paragraph2: Just share your exclusive referral code with friends. When they successfully register, you'll accumulate referrals, participate in prize drawings, and have a chance to become a "Referral Popularity King"!
intro.paragraph3: The more you refer, the more opportunities you get; invite friends and earn rewards for yourself.

howTo.title: How to Use Your Referral Code? Just Three Steps

steps.title: Get Your Referral Code
steps.description: Once you successfully register for SITCON 2026, the system will automatically generate an exclusive referral code for you. You can view it anytime on your personal registration page.

steps.title: Share with Friends
steps.description: Share your referral code with friends, classmates, or community partners who haven't registered yet. Any method works!

steps.title: Friends Complete Registration
steps.description: When they enter your referral code during registration and complete the process, it counts as one successful referral.

tips.title: Friendly Reminders
items: The same referral code can be used by multiple people
The system will automatically accumulate your successful referral count

lottery.title: One Lottery Entry Per Referral
lottery.description: For each successful referral, you'll receive one lottery entry. The more you refer, the higher your chances of winning!

topReferrers.title: Referral Popularity King
topReferrers.description: The top five with the most successful referrals will receive exclusive honors and SITCON 2026 commemorative gifts, publicly recognized and awarded at the SITCON 2026 conference!
rules: Ranked by successful referral count, top five winners.
In case of a tie, priority goes to those who made their first successful referral earlier.
Popularity King prizes must be collected at the conference venue; detailed collection procedures will be announced separately.

fairness.title: Fairness and Important Notes
fairness.description: To ensure fairness, the organizers will:
items: Exclude referral records generated by duplicate, abnormal, or fraudulent registrations
Reserve the right to disqualify participants found engaging in actions affecting fairness
All referral and lottery records are based on system data
fairness.disclaimer: The organizers reserve the right to final interpretation and adjustment of event content, prizes, and rules.
